I'm a UX Enthusiast

I design web user experiences. From the planning to interface design the end-user is at the heart of my process.

Process

I'm a Web Developer

I’m a web developer based in the London area, with a focus on front-end technologies. I design and build responsive websites and applications. I enjoy working collaboratively with clients to craft unique products that deliver great user experiences. I'm currently on the look out for exciting new projects to work on (part/full time or contractual), if you like my work or just fancy a chat... get in touch.

James Warren

Professional

SpectraKey

Technical Creative & Director (2010 - Present)

SpectraKey is a small creative media team crafting products for the web and video platforms. My current position involves:

  • Consulting with clients to help them understand their web requirements
  • Producing wireframes and user flows
  • Website design, using Adobe Illustrator
  • Building responsive websites using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and jQuery. Integrated with Joomla CMS (PHP/MySQL)
  • Undertaken training in Node.js, Angular.js, and UX techniques
  • Linux server administration; managed hosting service
  • Setup and management of cloud storage service

BSc (Hons) Music Technology - 1st

University of Hertfordshire (2010 - 2013)

I undertook a major technology project to design and build an interactive performace controller for electric guitarists.

The aim was to enable guitarists to interact with their instrument’s sound in unique and intuitive ways. I wanted to challenge the inflexibities in "traditional" guitar systems, which offer limited real-time control of effects processing.

University Prize Winner

Interests

Explorer

I love the outdoors. There’s nothing better than slipping on the walking boots and venturing into the english countryside; discovering hidden landscapes and gathering inspiration with my camera. When I’m feeling a little more adventurous I can be found climbing up cliff-faces.

Music

I’ve played guitar from an early age. I enjoy getting invloved in live music events. Currently I help run Discovery2’s emerging talent showcase.
